titleStmt.title: An arrovv against the separation of the Brownists Also an admonition touching Talmudique & rabbinical allegations. By Iohn Paget.
titleStmt.author: Paget, John, d. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: By George Veseler, dwelling by the South-Church, at the signe of the Hope,

notesStmt.note: A reply to Henry Ainsworth, whose arguments are included.
